actions.text: Amendment SA 1803 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

Amendment SA 1803 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator McCain. (consideration: CR S5942-5943; text: CR S5942-5943) To prohibit the obligation or expenditure of funds made available to the Department of Transportation for cyber security until the Secretary of Transportation submits to Congress a detailed plan describing how the funding will be allocated and for what purposes.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1803 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1803 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator McCain.

purpose: To prohibit the obligation or expenditure of funds made available to the Department of Transportation for cyber security until the Secretary of Transportation submits to Congress a detailed plan describing how the funding will be allocated and for what purposes.
